p: The most salient aspect that links the three topics —adaptation, co-production, and the SDGs— together, are processes of adapting and localizing the adaptation and other SDG targets at the local and regional levels, while simultaneously mitigating tradeoffs and strengthening synergies. A co-production approach seems crucial for such localizing processes to be successful (e.g., Glass and Newig, 2019; Reed et al., 2019; Valencia et al., 2019).
